name: PlatAlien
description: This is a platformer game i built following a tutorial by Lessmilk, A. K. A. Thomas Palef. I added sounds, and for the graphics, I used Kenney's pixel art platformer assets pack. I found the sound effects on FreeSound.org and the music was borrowed from the complete audio example on the official Phaser website. Feel free to send feedback in any way possible; my only condition is that if you have criticism, only use constructive criticism, please. Please enjoy my first game!
